languages.text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.
languages.original_text: Ассасины способны мастерски избегать вражеских атак и обрушивать на врага собственные разрушительные атаки в ближнем и в дальнем бою. Их сильная сторона — это высокий шанс уклонения и эффективное снижение уклонения, а также прицельные удары в слабые места.

traits.locale_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge penetration as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

languages.text: Los asesinos son inigualables en el arte de esquivar ataques enemigos y contraatacar con golpes letales, cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia. Utilizan su alta esquiva y reducción de esquiva junto con impactos precisos en los puntos débiles de sus rivales.
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

traits.locale_text: Los asesinos son inigualables en el arte de esquivar ataques enemigos y contraatacar con golpes letales, cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia. Utilizan su alta esquiva y penetración de esquiva junto con impactos precisos en los puntos débiles de sus rivales.

languages.text: 刺客擅长闪避敌人的攻击，利用近战或远程打击对敌人造成毁灭性的伤害。刺客拥有出色的闪避与闪避减免，还可以针对敌人的弱点进行精准打击。
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

traits.locale_text: 刺客擅长闪避敌人的攻击，利用近战或远程打击对敌人造成毁灭性的伤害。刺客拥有出色的闪避与闪避穿透，还可以针对敌人的弱点进行精准打击。

languages.text: アサシンは敵の攻撃を回避し、近接・遠距離を問わず壊滅的な打撃を与えることに長けている。高い回避と回避減少に加え、敵の弱点を的確に突いた攻撃を得意とする。
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

traits.locale_text: アサシンは敵の攻撃を回避し、近接・遠距離を問わず壊滅的な打撃を与えることに長けている。高い回避と回避減少に加え、敵の弱点を的確に突いた攻撃を得意とする。

languages.text: Assassinen sind vorbildlich darin, feindlichen Angriffen auszuweichen und dann ihre eigenen verheerenden Schläge im Nah- oder Fernkampf auszuführen. Sie profitieren von einer hohen Ausweichfähigkeit und Ausweichen-Reduktion sowie von präzise geplanten Angriffen auf die Schwachstellen des Feindes.
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

traits.locale_text: Assassinen sind vorbildlich darin, gegnerischen Angriffen auszuweichen und dann ihre eigenen verheerenden Schläge im Nah- oder Fernkampf auszuführen. Sie profitieren von einer hohen Ausweichfähigkeit und Durchschlagskraft sowie von präzise geplanten Angriffen auf die Schwachstellen des Gegners.

languages.text: Les assassins sont passés maîtres dans l'art d'esquiver les attaques de l'ennemi pour lui porter ensuite un coup dévastateur, en mêlée comme à distance. Ils bénéficient d'une esquive élevée, infligent des réductions d'esquive et peuvent planifier des attaques de précision sur les points faibles de l'ennemi.
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

traits.locale_text: Les Assassins sont passés maîtres dans l'art d'esquiver les attaques de l'ennemi pour lui porter ensuite un coup dévastateur, en mêlée comme à distance. Ils bénéficient d'une esquive et d'une pénétration d'esquive élevées, et peuvent planifier des attaques de précision sur les points faibles de l'ennemi.

languages.text: Ассасины способны мастерски избегать вражеских атак и обрушивать на врага собственные разрушительные атаки в ближнем и в дальнем бою. Их сильная сторона — это высокий шанс уклонения и эффективное снижение уклонения, а также прицельные удары в слабые места.
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.

Ассасины способны мастерски избегать вражеских атак и обрушивать на врага собственные разрушительные атаки в ближнем и в дальнем бою. Их сильная сторона — это высокий шанс уклонения и эффективное снижение уклонения, а также прицельные удары в слабые места.

languages.text: Suikastçı, düşman saldırılarından sakınıp kendi yıkıcı darbelerini indirme konusunda örnek teşkil eder. Yüksek kaçınma ve kaçınma azaltımı yetilerine sahiptir. Düşmanın zayıf noktalarına planlı ve isabetli saldırılar gerçekleştirebilir.
languages.original_text: Assassins are exemplary at evading enemy attacks and then delivering their own devastating blows, melee or ranged. They benefit from high dodge and dodge reduction as well as precisely planned attacks on enemy's weak spots.
